title: Acolyte

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, guess a player's class. If you're correct, they will be poisoned at the end of that night and will die the following night. You have 1 use of this ability.
- At night, choose a target and drop their defense to None. You have 3 uses of this ability.
- At night, if one of the Cult Leader's Eradicate targets survives the night, the Cult Leader will gain a use of Rupture. You have 1 use of this ability.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- This role is converted from Town Killing members.
- Once you become the Cult Leader, you gain an additional use of Rupture.
